welcome_message_body: Welcome to charming Ergoldsbach, a quaint town known for its beautiful landscape and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Smaller terminal for budget airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ingolstadt-manching Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
